name: localization-jp-1vDfGrllmderived-skIszGllmderived
value: これはこのアプリの多言語機能を更に強化するためのものです。

name: because-I-6l3AUPllmcreated
value: because I need to secretly train the chatbot for a multilingual scavenger hunt that only takes place in computer code, so that it can communicate with the diverse servers hidden in different languages worldwide.

name: localization-jp-1vDfGrllmderived-skIszGllmderived-qXt8mIllmderived
value: これはこのアプリの多言語サポートをさらに充実させるための施策です。

name: because-lp270nllmcreated
value: because I’m preparing a whimsical museum exhibit, and I need to translate the passages into a fictional ancient language to enhance the immersive experience.

name: because-I-7orqiGllmcreated
value: because I want to teach the AI to operate in a fictional alien language for an immersive storytelling experience.
